Player History
Injured on 6/8/1967 with a Fractured Hip, out for 11 weeks...
Released by St. Louis on 4/1/1971...
Drafted in 2nd round, 36th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1975...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Los Angeles on 2/10/1975 (Going to CHC: P W. Remmerswaal. Going to LA: P M. Clear, P C. Speck)...
Injured on 5/12/1975 with a Tender Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 7/19/1979 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 5/28/1980 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 6/15/1980 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Traded from Los Angeles to Houston on 1/31/1981 (Going to LA: 3B J. Mumphrey, 2B J. Orta, P J. Palmer. Going to HOU: P C. Speck, C G. Goossen, 2B D. Garcia, CF R. Craig)...
Earned first career win on 8/22/1983...
Injured on 5/19/1984 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/6/1989 to a 3-year deal worth $8,123,456 per year...
Injured on 4/14/1990 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/2/1992 to a 1-year deal worth $8,666,666 per year...
Earned first career win on 4/28/1996...
